text: No person shall be denied the services enumerated in §§ 47-2713 to 47- 2716 because of his or her inability to pay for those services.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-2716.

1973 Ed., § 47-2215a.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-82, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2702.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-24, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2713.

DC CODE § 47-2716

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Denial of medical or mental health services for inability to pay prohibited.
